page.title: 16LIFE IN A VILLAGE
page.content: We wrote out a questionnaire for 17 school children of{West Stoke}and {Funtington.}From the replies we found only 1 person was born in the village, nobody had parents born in the village and only 1 girl had a relative living in the village.5 fathers worked in the village,and 4 of those worked on the land.Most of the children go to school by car and the rest by bus or bicycle. Three quarters of the children spend most of their spare time in the village, doing the same things as us.They go to town quite regularly and all but 2 have been to London.No one shopped locally, and almost all of them liked living in a village.
